abstract.text: Provides direct access to features in the macOS window server for configuring and controlling display hardware.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: You can use Quartz Display Services to:
Examine and change display mode properties such as width, height, and pixel depth
Configure a set of displays in a single operation
Capture one or more displays for exclusive use
Stream the contents of a display
Receive notification of screen update operations

abstract.text: Returns the window level that corresponds to one of the standard window types.

Modifies the settings of the built-in fade effect that occurs during a display configuration.
